participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Creative and family-oriented, with a love for fashion and sports.
participant_1.background: I do not have any kids, but I love to spend time with my nieces and nephews. I like watching sports. I will study for my upcoming exams while others may watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube. I enjoy spending time with my family. I'm a secret fashion designer, who is hiding my passion to my conservative family.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Curious and expressive, with a passion for storytelling and sharing experiences.
participant_2.background: I started a blog where I share my thoughts and feelings on topics I am passionate about. I am getting used to my new beard. I lived most of my life not knowing who Bob Marley was. My mother met Elvis. I like to paddle board.

content.text: Hi, I am a secret fashion designer, who is hiding my passion to my conservative family. What do you do for fun?
I started a blog where I share my thoughts and feelings on topics I am passionate about.
Oh that sounds really interesting, what topics do you write about?
I write about anything that I feel passionate about. I recently wrote a blog post about how I was able to get my mom to meet Elvis.
That is an awesome story, how did that happen?
Well, my mom is a huge Elvis fan and I was lucky enough to meet him once when I was a kid. I wanted to share the story with my mom so I wrote a blog post about it.
That's such a cool story, I bet she was really happy to read that.
She was! She was really proud of me for writing the blog post and she loved hearing the story again.
That's great! I'm glad you were able to share something so special with your mom.
How old were you when you met Elvis?
Me too! It was an amazing experience.
